title: No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When working in the Photon version of Eclipse IDE, there is a bug where the popup menu does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a java editor. This menu should provide options to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
OB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a java editor, no popup menu is displayed.
EB: When right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a java editor, a popup menu should be displayed, providing options to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
SR: 1) Open the Eclipse IDE.2) Open a java editor.3) Right-click on the left vertical ruler in the java editor.4) Verify that a popup menu is displayed with options to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
